column4: Hey, guys.  I'm using XChat on ubuntu and every other time I try to connect to the FreeNode server it says my nickname is already in use.  Is this because somehow I didn't "logout" from my past session or something?
Are you registered with that nick.. there are ghosts which you can kill if it was you
I have registered that nickname.  What does GHOST do?  it just lets the nickserv know that I AM that screenname?
Read up on freenode / irc and ghost nicks and how to kill them
